.tabset>input:nth-child(7):checked~.tab-panels>.tab-panel:nth-child(4),#cards-header .tabset>input:nth-child(9):checked~.tab-panels>.tab-panel:nth-child(5),#cards-header .tabset>input:nth-child(11):checked~.tab-panels>.tab-panel:nth-child(6){display:block}#cards-header .tabset>label{position:relative;display:inline-block;padding:15px 15px 25px;cursor:pointer;color:RGB(var(--now-color_text--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-18,22,27,28)))}#cards-header .tabset>label:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:15px;bottom:10px;width:22px;height:4px;background:RGB(var(--now-color_divider--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-7,135,147,148)));border-radius:6px}#cards-header .tabset>input:checked+label:after,#cards-header .tabset>input:focus+label:after,#cards-header .tabset>label:hover:after{background:RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109));border-radius:6px}#cards-header .tabset>input:checked+label{margin-bottom:-1px}#info-cards{height:63vh;overflow-y:auto}#info-cards>ul{list-style-type:none;border-left:2px solid rgb(var(--now-color--primary-2,23,100,82));padding:0 1em;margin-left:10px;margin-right:0}#info-cards>ul .info-card{position:relative;transition:.5s}#info-cards>ul .info-card:before{position:absolute;content:"";width:10px;height:10px;background-color:#34ace0;border-radius:50%;left:-23px;top:20px;transition:.5s}#info-cards>ul .info-card:hover:before{background-color:#0f0;box-shadow:0 0 5px 2px #0f0}#info-cards::-webkit-scrollbar{width:16px}#info-cards::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:RGB(var(--now-color_background--secondary,var(--now-color--neutral-1,246,247,247)));border-radius:8px}#info-cards::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109));border-radius:8px;border:3px solid rgb(var(--now-color_background--secondary,var(--now-color--neutral-1,246,247,247)))}#info-cards::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:RGB(var(--now-color--primary-2,23,100,82))}#info-cards::-webkit-scrollbar-corner{opacity:0}.info-card{background-color:RGB(var(--now-color_background--secondary,var(--now-color--neutral-1,246,247,247)));border:1px solid rgb(var(--now-color_border--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-7,135,147,148)));border-radius:6px;padding:12px;margin-bottom:8px}.info-card .card-header{display:grid;grid-template-columns:auto auto;justify-content:space-between;align-content:space-between;height:50px}.info-card .card-header .right{margin-right:30px}.info-card .full-width{width:100%}.info-card .card-body.overflow,.info-card .card-body pre{overflow-x:auto}.info-card .card-body .key{color:RGB(var(--now-color--primary-1,30,133,109))}.info-card .card-body .column-left{float:left;width:50%}.info-card .card-body .column-right{float:right;width:50%}.info-card .card-body .description{border-bottom:1px solid rgb(var(--now-color_border--primary,var(--now-color--neutral-7,135,147,148)));padding:4px;margin:8px 0;width:100%}.info-card .card-body .bottom{margin-bottom:8px}.info-card .card-body .green{color:#77b27b}.info-card .card-body
